column5: Headed out for the first trip of the season yesterday with a couple buddies on some local ponds. It was a successful mixed bag but unfortunately the true species we were after (big northerns) only showed his head once. No leader and a new fangled tip up device got the best of me and I lost my first trophy of the ice season on a frozen sardine.  Otherwise, the slabs, bluegills and perch were good to me.  First fish of the day was a little largemouth. The only one I saw all day. I gave him a quick photo since he was the first fish of the season. Hope that doesn't offend anybody.
Good catches, WTG   Looks like it was a good 1st day out on the ice
Great mix bag Rich Good way to start the season Leechman
Nice job Rich, looking forward to getting out myself.
WTG on the crappie...looks like a good time man.
